title: 3dLombScargle
description: Make a periodogram or amplitude-spectrum of a time series that has a non-constant sampling rate

time_points.title: Sampled time points file
time_points.description: 1D file of the sampled time points (in units of seconds) of the analyzed data set

frequency_points.title: Frequency sample points file
frequency_points.description: 1D file of the frequency sample points (in units of 1/seconds) of the output periodogram/spectrum data set

amplitude_spectrum.title: Amplitude spectrum file
amplitude_spectrum.description: Volumetric data set containing a LS-derived amplitude spectrum

power_spectrum.title: Power spectrum file
power_spectrum.description: Volumetric data set containing a LS-derived power spectrum
